title: [BuildCheck][FeatureRequest] Env variable BuildCheck reports value
body:
Current implementation of the EnvVariable BuildCheck when turned on reports the actual value that were set during the build of the Environment variable. 
```
"Property is derived from environment variable: 'OS' with value: 'Windows_NT'. Properties should be passed explicitly using the /p option."
```
Howver in some scenarios it could be unexpected behavior hence the suggestion is to remove the showing it by default and enable this behavior by explicitly configuring it.
